amendment.description: To set aside an amount for the Joint Logistics Information System program for the automated scheduling tool.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3524 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3524 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S7379; text: CR S7379) To set aside an amount for the Joint Logistics Information System program for the automated scheduling tool.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3524 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3524 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Landrieu.
